abilityList.name: S1: Photonic Will
abilityList.effect:
Boosts damage by 3% while PP
at is 40% or above.

abilityList.name: S1: Double-Edged Sword
abilityList.effect:
Deal 4% more damage but take
8% more damage.

abilityList.name: S1: Perfect Chain Will
abilityList.effect:
Successive Just Attacks will
increase damage up to 3%.

abilityList.name: S1: Seagleam
abilityList.effect:
Recover 4% HP every second for 30
seconds after taking 600 damage.

abilityList.name: S1: Snowgleam
abilityList.effect:
+20% PP Recovery on attacks for 30
seconds after using 150 PP.

abilityList.name: S1: Moongleam
abilityList.effect:
8% PP Consumption Reduction for 20
seconds upon Just Guarding.

abilityList.name: S1: Leafgleam
abilityList.effect:
Every 20 seconds, a barrier will
turn on/off. The barrier reduces
damage by 8% and prevents flinching.

abilityList.name: S1: Shadowgleam
abilityList.effect:
Increase Natural PP Recovery for 20
seconds after standing still
for 5 seconds.

abilityList.name: S1: Wake of Destruction Photon
abilityList.effect:
Recovery PP upon enemies
being defeated near you.

abilityList.name: S1: Goliathslayer's Will
abilityList.effect: Increase damage dealt to bosses by 4%.

abilityList.name: S1: Lustrous Partbreaker
abilityList.effect:
Increase PP recovery rate by 40%
when attacking breakable parts.

abilityList.name: S1: Spectre's Will
abilityList.effect:
Boosts damage based
on the Photon Blast
gauge.

abilityList.name: S1: Elementalist's Will
abilityList.effect:
Increase damage by 4%
if your weapon's element
or equipped Guard Ring
match the enemy's elemental weakness.

abilityList.name: S1:Violent Invigoration
abilityList.effect:
Increase damage and PP recovery.
Reduce PP consumption.
Effect resets when damage is taken.

abilityList.name: S1: Favor of Madness
abilityList.effect:
Increase might by 5% and
reduce damage taken by 12% in the
Quest Solo Training: Phanatical Phantoms.

abilityList.name: S1: Lucent Domain 2
abilityList.effect:
Recover PP when an enemy
near you is defeated. (+4 PP)

abilityList.name: S1: Will of the Dying
abilityList.effect:
Reduce HP by 5% every 20 seconds
and increase might by 4%.

abilityList.name: S1: Timeflow Will
abilityList.effect:
Increase might every second.
Maxes at 4% (30s to MAX).

abilityList.name: S1: Melee Amp
abilityList.effect:
Increase might by 1% for every 60 MEL Pwr
of special abilities
added to this weapon to the item,
and boosts by a further 2% if 200+

abilityList.name: S1:Precision Boost
abilityList.effect:
Increase might by 1% for every 60 RNG Pwr
of special abilities
added to this weapon to the item,
and boosts by a further 2% if 200+

abilityList.name: S1: Technique Amp
abilityList.effect:
Increase might by 1% for every 60 TEC Pwr
of special abilities
added to this weapon to the item,
and boosts by a further 2% if 200+

abilityList.name: S1: Dance with Death
abilityList.effect:
Boosts power each
time you take damage,
up to three levels. If
you take damage at
maximum boost,
damages everything
around you and
reduces your HP to 1.

abilityList.name: S1: Augment Will
abilityList.effect:
Boosts power for each
special ability added
to the item. Maximum
boost: 4%.

abilityList.name: S1: Crippling Erode
abilityList.effect:
Grant a 25% chance to inflict
the Jellen status when attacking an enemy.

abilityList.name: S1: Photon Balance
abilityList.effect:
Increases PP
consumption by 8%,
but boosts PA and
Tech damage by 4%.

abilityList.name: S1: Comrade's Blessing
abilityList.effect:
Reduces PP consumption,
boosts critical rate and
boosts power based on
the number of people in
your party (min. 2).

abilityList.name: S2: Tumultuous Vitality
abilityList.effect:
Gives a fixed chance of
restoring HP equal to 1%
of damage dealt. (Max: 300)

abilityList.name: S2: Catastrophic Photon
abilityList.effect: Recovers PP by 15% when taking damage.

abilityList.name: S2: Dynamo Dance
abilityList.effect:
Raises damage by 3% when Just
Attacking different PAs or
Techniques.

abilityList.name: S2: Prowess of the Petalsea
abilityList.effect:
Increase Critical Hit Rate by 20%
when S1: Petalgleam, S1:Blue
Ocean Flash, or S1: Snowgleam are active.

abilityList.name: S2: Resolve of the Petalsea
abilityList.effect:
Increase damage by 3% when S1:Red
Petal Flash, S1: Seagleam,
or S1: Snowgleam are active.

abilityList.name: S2:Nature's Exhilaration
abilityList.effect:
Recover 2% HP every second when S1:Red
Petal Flash, S1: Seagleam,
or S1: Snowgleam are active.

abilityList.name: S2:Nature's Reduction
abilityList.effect:

Petal Flash, S1: Seagleam,
or S1: Snowgleam are active.

abilityList.name: S2: Moonlit Shadowforest Passive

or S1: Shadowgleam are active.

abilityList.name: S2: Shield of the Moonleaf

or S1: Shadowgleam are active.

abilityList.name: S2: Wake of Destruction Photon

Recover PP when an enemy near you
is defeated.

abilityList.name: S2: Two-edged Strike
abilityList.effect:

abilityList.name: S2: Goliathslayer's Will
abilityList.effect: Increase damage dealt to bosses by 3%.

abilityList.name: S2: Lustrous Spectre
abilityList.effect:
Increase Active PP Recovery based

Increase Natural PP Recovery based

abilityList.name: S2: Spectre Shield
abilityList.effect:
Reduce damage taken based
on the Photon Blast Guage.

abilityList.name: S2: Favor of Madness
abilityList.effect:
Increase power by 5%
and reduce damage taken by 12%
in the Quest Solo Training: Phanatical Phantoms.

abilityList.name: S2:Violent Invigoration
abilityList.effect:
Increase damage and PP recovery.
Reduce PP consumption.
Effect resets when damage is taken.

abilityList.name: S2: Moonleaf Song
abilityList.effect:
Increase power over time when
S1: Moongleam, S1: Leafgleam,
or S1: Shadowgleam are active.
Maxes at 5%

abilityList.name: S2: Petalsea Descent 2
abilityList.effect:
Reduce PP consumption by 14%
when S1: Petalgleam,
S1: Seagleam,
or S1: Snowgleam are active.

abilityList.name: S2: Lustrous Moonleaf 2
abilityList.effect:
Increase Active PP Recovery by 28%
when S1: Moongleam, S1: Leafgleam,
or S1: Shadowgleam are active.

abilityList.name: S2: Medical Grace
abilityList.effect:
Boost PP recovery when a -mate item is used.
Effects varies per mate.

abilityList.name: S2: Lustrous Moonleaf
abilityList.effect:
Increase Active PP Recovery by 25%
when S1: Moongleam, S1: Leafgleam,
or S1: Shadowgleam are active.

abilityList.name: S2: Perfect Descent
abilityList.effect:
Reduces PP consumption by 12% when Just
Attacking different PAs or Techniques.

abilityList.name: S2: Runner's High
abilityList.effect:
Increase Natural PP Recovery by 100%
and restore 15% HP every 5 seconds when running.

abilityList.name: S2: One with the Flame
abilityList.effect:
Increases your Fire
attribute and Burn
resistance. Boosts
power against enemies
that are weak to Fire.

abilityList.name: S2: One with the Tundra
abilityList.effect:
Increases your Ice
attribute and Freeze

power against enemies
that are weak to Ice.

abilityList.name: S2: One with the Thunder
abilityList.effect:
Increases your Lightning
attribute and Shock
resistance. Boosts
power against enemies
that are weak to Lightning.

abilityList.name: S2: Prowess in Descent
abilityList.effect:
Reduces PP consumption
by 5% for 30 seconds
after hitting with a PA
or Tech. Occasionally
reduces consumption
by 30%. Has a cooldown.

abilityList.name: S2: One with the Tempest
abilityList.effect:
Increases your Wind
attribute and Shock
resistance. Boosts
power against enemies
that are weak to Wind.

abilityList.name: S2: Perfect Guard Boon
abilityList.effect:
When you Just Guard
at less than 25% HP,

and PP by 30%.

abilityList.name: S2: Heaven-Earth Lucentboost
abilityList.effect:
In the air, reduces PP
consumption by 8%.
On the ground, boosts
PP regeneration and
attack PP recovery
by 20%.

abilityList.name: S2: One with the Light
abilityList.effect:
Increases your Light
attribute and Panic
resistance. Boosts
power against enemies
that are weak to Light.

abilityList.name: S2:Darkness Guard
abilityList.effect:
Increases your Dark
attribute and Poison
resistance. Boosts
power against enemies
that are weak to Dark.

abilityList.effect: Recover 75% of your maximum HP at regular intervals.

abilityList.effect: Increase damage against breakable parts by 3%.

Recovers 70 HP when
you hit with a normal

between activations.

abilityList.name: S3: Strikeflow Shield
abilityList.effect:
Decrease damage taken by 1% for
every 300,000 damage dealt. Maxes at 15%.

abilityList.name: S3: Strikeflow Descent
abilityList.effect:
Decrease PP consumption by 1% for
every 300,000 damage dealt. Maxes at 15%.

abilityList.name: S3: Adversity Adept
abilityList.effect:
Increase Critical Hit Rate by 2% for
every 300,000 damage dealt. Maxes at 30%.

abilityList.name: S4: Instant Guard Photons
abilityList.effect: Restores PP on a successful Just Guard.

abilityList.name: S4: Steely Determination
abilityList.effect: Survive one fatal hit with 1 HP remaining.

abilityList.name: S4: Photon Adaptation
abilityList.effect: Raises PP efficiency based on maximum PP.

abilityList.name: S4: Frontal Adept
abilityList.effect:
During Brave Stance, frontal critical
rate is raised by 30%.

abilityList.name: S4: Hammer of the Wise
abilityList.effect: During Wise Stance, boosts frontal damage by 15%.

abilityList.name: S4: Lifesteal
abilityList.effect:
Restores HP equal to 1% of damage dealt.
(Max: 30)

abilityList.name: S4: Mettle of the Rested
abilityList.effect:
Become immune to knockback by standing still
for a certain time.

abilityList.name: S4: Photonic Trap
abilityList.effect:
Increases PP recovery from Tactics Trap by
20%.

abilityList.name: S4: Impregnable Chain
abilityList.effect:
Become invincible for 5 seconds when activating
Chain Trigger.

abilityList.name: S4: Sustained Cycle
abilityList.effect: Reduces recast time of Photon Flare by 20%.

abilityList.name: S4: Prolonged Katana Release
abilityList.effect:
Decreases rate that Gear gauge empties while
Katana Gear is active.

abilityList.name: S4: Swift Arrows
abilityList.effect:
Bullet Bow damage is boosted by 3% during
Rapid Shot.

abilityList.name: S4: Support Amplification
abilityList.effect:
Extends the effect of Shifta and Deband to
last 120 seconds.

abilityList.name: S4: Transmutation Circle
abilityList.effect:
Changes the weapon's element to match an equipped
Guard ring.

abilityList.name: S4: Luminous Protection
abilityList.effect:
Bestow Natural PP Recovery and
increase PP recovery rate while Guarding.

abilityList.name: S4: Steadfast Will
abilityList.effect:
Increase the power of
Normal Attacks by 13%.

abilityList.name: S4: Precise Balance
abilityList.effect:
Reduce Critical Hit Rate by 50% and
increase the power of Critical Hits by 6%.

abilityList.name: S4: Saintly Shield
abilityList.effect:
Generates a barrier (-50% Damage Taken,
Negate Knockback) at regular intervals

abilityList.name: S4: Rainbow Balance
abilityList.effect:
Decrease Natural PP Recovery but decrease
PP consumption when S1: Petalgleam,
S1: Seagleam, S1: Snowgleam,
S1: Moongleam, S1: Leafgleam,
or S1: Shadowgleam are active.

abilityList.name: S3: Escalating Pursuit
abilityList.effect:
When you hit with a
PA/Tech, boosts damage
of the next PA/Tech
based on the damage you
deal in the next 4 seconds.

abilityList.name: S4:Skilled Crippler
abilityList.effect:
Boosts critical hit rate
by 50% against enemies
affected by Jellen,
Weak Bullet or a status
effect.

abilityList.name: S4:Cursed Rainbow
abilityList.effect:
While Petal, Ocean,
Leaf, Moon, Snow or
Shadow Flash is active:
Recovers 500 HP each
time you take 500 or
more damage at once.

abilityList.name: S4:Evasion Training
abilityList.effect:
Evading when the two
circles overlap puts
you in a "Successful
Evasion" state. If you
do not evade, recovers
5% of maximum HP.

abilityList.name: S4:Colossal Radiance
abilityList.effect:
Recovers 40 PP every
10 seconds when there
is a boss nearby.

abilityList.name: S5:Release Parry
abilityList.effect:
Performance alters
after a Just Guard
using the Weapon
Action. Sword only.

abilityList.name: S5:Unrivaled Parry
abilityList.effect:
After a Just Guard,
Gear consumption
reduced to 0 for 15
seconds. Boosts damage
by 2%. Wired Lance only.

abilityList.name: S5:Rushing Bolt
abilityList.effect:
Damages enemies when
you touch them while
running at high speed.
When you stop running,
generates a shockwave.
Boosts damage by 2%.
Partizan only.

abilityList.name: S5:Shining Cyclone
abilityList.effect:
PP consumption and PP
recovery sped change
when below 50% PP.
Twin Daggers only.

abilityList.name: S5:Evasive Barrage
abilityList.effect:
Fills Gear Gauge and
hits enemies with a
powerful blow on a
successful DS Wind
Parry. Boosts damage
by 2%. Double Saber
only.

abilityList.name: S5:Evasive Meteor
abilityList.effect:
Drops a giant fist on the
target after avoiding an
attack with Sway.
Boosts damage by 2%.
Knuckles only.

abilityList.name: S5:Hangeki Edge
abilityList.effect:
Boosts Counter power.
A successful Braver
counter fills Gear to
maximum. Katana only.

abilityList.name: S5:Thundering Pursuit
abilityList.effect:
When using a PA,
lightning bolts are
formed from Photons.
Dual Blades only.

abilityList.name: S5:Fiery End
abilityList.effect:
Boosts End Attract.
Has a cooldown after
using End Attract.
Cooldown time is
shortened when you
avoid an attack with
Dive Roll. Boosts
damage by 2%.
Assault Rifle only.

abilityList.name: S5:Fiery Zero
abilityList.effect:
Boosts Zero Distance.
Has a cooldown after
using Zero Distance.
Cooldown time is
shortened when you
avoid an attack with
Dive Roll. Boosts
damage by 2%.
Launcher only.

abilityList.name: S5:Bright Escape
abilityList.effect:
Grants a PP recovery
effect when you
evade an attack with
Step or Stylish Roll,
until you take damage.
Twin Machineguns only.

abilityList.name: S5:Auxiliary Arrow
abilityList.effect:
Creates a Chase
Arrow each time you
hit with a PA other than
Banishing Arrow.
Boosts these Chase
Arrows for a short
time each time you
avoid an attack with
Step.

abilityList.name: S5:Calming Bullet
abilityList.effect:
Enhances normal
attacks and boosts the
power of Rod Shoot by
100%. Rod only.

abilityList.name: S5:Speedy Support
abilityList.effect:
Reduces the charge
time of support Techs.
Reduces the power of
Zondeel. Talis only.

abilityList.name: S5:Calming Shockwave
abilityList.effect:
Unleashes a shockwave
on your third step
normal attack. Boosts
damage by 2%. Wand
only.

abilityList.name: S5:Rhythmic Pursuer
abilityList.effect:
Boosts the power of
Elemental Burst by 30%
and activates it
automatically during PA
Shift Actions. Jet Boots
only.

abilityList.name: S5:Mysterious Intent
abilityList.effect:
Boosts critical hit rate
by 20%. On a critical
hit, boosts damage by
2% and recovers 1%
of damage dealt as HP.
(Max. recovery: 30 HP)

abilityList.name: S6: Heroic Howl
abilityList.effect:
Enhances Hero Boost.
Increases the rate that
Hero Boosts's damage
boost increases. No
effect if using weapon
with "Heroic Victory".

abilityList.name: S6: Soaring Heavendance
abilityList.effect:
Bouncer weapon Gear
fills while standing still.
No effect if using
weapon with "Angelic
Guidance".

abilityList.name: S6: Soul Protection
abilityList.effect:
Hunter weapon and
Katana Gear fills while
Guarding. No effect if
using weapon with
"Zephyr's Edge".

abilityList.name: S6: Tenacious Healscourge
abilityList.effect:
Become massive for 60
seconds after becoming
affected by a status
effect.

abilityList.name: S6: Lucent Domain
abilityList.effect:
When an enemy is
defeated within a
certain range,
recovers 5 PP.

abilityList.name: S6: Shield of the Sentinel
abilityList.effect:
Gain a 10% chance to
reduce damage by
70%.

abilityList.name: S6: Dodging Whistle
abilityList.effect:
Dodging will cause
your pet to return
back to you.

abilityList.name: S6: Shield of Carnage
abilityList.effect:
When your HP is at 50%
or lower, damage is
reduced by 40%.
Resets after a
brief cooldown.

abilityList.name: S6:Long Night Star
abilityList.effect:
Reduces Etoile Boost's
decay per second by
50%.

abilityList.name: S7: Still Grace
abilityList.effect:
Recovers 4 PP per
second when standing
still for longer than 1
second.

abilityList.name: S7: Supreme Perfection
abilityList.effect:
Gain a 10% chance
to stun the enemy
with a Just Attack.

abilityList.name: S7:Increased Efficiency
abilityList.effect:
Boosts the effect of
recovery items by 30%.

abilityList.name: S7:Mind Merge
abilityList.effect:
Automatically answers
Sympathy requests
during Alter Ego. No
effect if using weapon
with "Glance of
Darkness"

abilityList.name: S8: Skydance Support
abilityList.effect:
Activates Shifta and
Deband every 10
seconds when you stay
in the air for longer than
2 seconds.

abilityList.name: S8: Mighty Medication
abilityList.effect:
Makes you temporarily
invincible after drinking
a -mate item.

abilityList.name: S8:High-Minded
abilityList.effect:
Reduces falling speed
while charging a
Technique in the air.
